Oncle Bob

The simplest way to publish your static sites.
Bob's your uncle.

Why Oncle Bob?

  • Drag, drop, done — Point to your folder and go live instantly. No terminal required.
  • Zero configuration — Forget YAML files and complex CI/CD pipelines. It just works.
  • Local-first — Build, test, and preview your changes instantly, even without internet.
  • Universal compatibility — Works with any static site generator (Hugo, Jekyll, 11ty) or plain HTML/JS.
  • Open Source — Built by the community, for the community. Free to use and modify.

Currently in Early Access (v0.0.2).
Hosting is provided by xmit.co. Open to supporting alternatives!
Have a feature request? Join our Discord.
